column14: My skin is so soft and all of my kids love these products. We all break out easily from chemicals in products and we haven’t had an issue at all!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
column14: More Vanilla than lavender but it smells amazing! I only use this brand of body wash because I have sensitive skin. This body wash gets you clean without making you feel rubbery and smells really good.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2020
column14: This product...gentle...cleansing...light pleasant smell and lasts a long time! Really like this soap and we have also tried the lotion in the same fragrance!  Thanks for a great product!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2021
column14: EVERYONE makes excellent products. The only reason I cannot give this five stars is because the scent is supposed to be Vanilla & Lavender but there isn't even a hint of vanilla scent. Literally none. This is the first EVERYONE product I've purchased that did not come exactly as described. I'll give these ones away and go back to a previously purchased scent.

column6: Love this product but shipping not so much
column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2022
column14: We absolutely love this product and have never had an issue with it. This review is mostly on the most recent shipment we received of this product. As you can see from photos there was a pretty bad leak. I would guess maybe about 2 ounces of the product leaked out onto the box. As it turns out, one of the bottle pumps was loose and leaked. I’m not sure what the best solution is to keep from this happening again in the future, but it definitely required a little extra clean up upon unpacking.

column14: I love this product! Its smells amazing and feels wonderful. My whole family uses it. I will be purchasing other products from this line.

column14: First of all I love the clean smell of this soap. I like that it last longer than other soaps I’ve used in this size container. I use it in my guest bathroom too as it can be used for soap and shampoo.

column14: Works well and smells great but is a bit expensive. I have dry skin and bathing makes it worse. This stuff really cleans well and hydrates.

column14: Smells great but I noticed on arrival it isn't even a full bottle and it wasn't leaking.  For the price, this is unacceptable.  Very disappointing. That's a lot missing.

column14: I wanted to like this but it didn't do much for me and the strawberry like smell didn't sit well. It was faint and something I could smell throughout the day and it turned me off

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020
column14: It’s a good shampoo, my husband likes it but I should’ve read the size of the bottle because it is very small.

column6: Overwhelming Orange - I Ordered Green Tea Lemongrass
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2018
column14: Lathers well, cleans well, and works well as a shave gel. I ordered Green Tea Lemongrass scent, however, it smells like orange. Not just a hint, it's a smack you in the face with righteous indignation ORANGE! For many, this is not a big deal, may even be awesome to feel like a major league pitcher threw an orange fresh from the tree at 90 mph that slammed right between your eyes while standing in the middle of a Florida orange grove. However, I detest the fragrance (also the taste/flavor) of oranges. Needless to say when my husband was decanting it into a smaller pump dispenser for our bathroom he was shocked that I purchased something orange, his favorite. I thought I could deal since it was open, and my orange aficionado husband was happy...and again, it was already open. I was wrong. The scent is not light. However, the nausea from the fragrance has really shortened my shower time in the morning and I am also much more alert as I am trying to keep my stomach settled. I would take off 2 stars for the fragrance (I have a true disdain for oranges) but the scent doesn't linger on your skin so since it's just 3-10 minutes a day in the underworld I kick 1 star. Everything else about the body wash is great, but it's hard to appreciate it while under olfactory assault.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2018
column14: This product says that it is gentle and "sulfate free".  The second ingredient listed is olefin sulfonate .  While it is not sodium laurel sulfate which is usually in soaps and shampoos, it is just as harsh.  This product is very hard on eyes and other sensitive areas.  I got a mild chemical burn in a very sensitive part of my body.  The smell is not anything like lemongrass.  It smells more like a combination of oranges and musk.  Not an appealing aroma at all.  This product does lather and clean well.  If it had been branded as a hand soap, I probably would have been OK with it.  But it is much too harsh for a body wash.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2018
column14: Technically, a sulfonate is not a sulfate, but they are irritating to skin, and that's what I was trying to avoid by buying this product.  Amazon clearly does zero vetting on how products are advertised, so as far as consumer protection, you are still in the wild, wild west.  Buyer beware.  Only after opening, and noticing the weird way the liquid flowed did I check the ingredient list.  Sure, no sulfates, but saying that is totally misleading.  Cheap crap, worse than Suave shampoo.

column6: Beautiful scent that isn’t chemical fades appropriately.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2021
column14: I’m a 73 year old woman who lives alone. I’ve been using dr.bonners soap for at least 35 years, probably more. I also used bio clean face wash. But..a year ago, I went online to buy those and realized I could no longer afford them. Distressed, I look around and found this one. Very scary, really, to buy an entire gallon of something I knew nothing about..  but, price was good, ingredients looked good so because Amazon has such a good return policy I decided to take a risk. When it arrived, I immediately loved the fragile smell. But I’m so sensitive to orders I worried the fragrance might stick to my skin and smell artificial..it didn’t. .  Right, so being happy with the fragrance and later with the beautiful feel of it, I still didn’t write a review because I was curious if it would start smelling ‘off,’. As dr. Bonners often does. Right, so I’m writing to say this gallon has lasted me one full year with no deterioration that I can ferrite out. And, I think I said, i really am very sensitive to that kind of stuff.  Long story just to say I just ordered my second gallon. Really good product. Thank you. I hope you don’t get so popular that your prices go up. 🥰

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2018
column14: This is my second time purchasing this product in this scent. Let me just say this: my husband is VERY picky about the smell of his bath products, and he likes the smell of this. It's light and refreshing without being heady or floral. It doesn't smell "girly" at all. And the amount of body wash you get for the price is just unbeatable, and the quality is great. Really no downsides to this, except for using a large unwieldy bottle. I guess you could portion it out into smaller bottles if you really wanted to!

column6: Proceed with caution! This product gave me a really *BAD* rash/skin irritation.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2017
column14: Purchased this product in July, but just got around to using it this week. Felt the "burning" sensation that others have mentioned the first time I used it. Some skin irritation and itching occurred after my shower. The next day, used it again and this time I broke out in a really *bad* rash on my arms, torso, back and legs. Extremely itchy, swollen and red. It was so bad, I had to run out to pick up some antihistamines. Luckily, the medicine worked, and about 3-4 hours later I was OK.

column6: Good product if it gets delivered intact.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
column14: this is the second time purchasing this item.  Love the smell and the value but this time the cap was off and it leaked everywhere and ruined other items in the shipping box. Need to put the product in a clear bag and tape on the lid to prevent spills

column6: A reason that ingredients aren’t listed

column14: Decent product with some good ingredients, but also has some terrible ingredients. Synthetic fragrances and artificial colors. Shame. Could have been a great product. Be transparent/honest about your product too!
